verbs.description: — [ARGM-DIS: In terms of evidence] , [ARG1: Text Messages] [V: are] [ARG2: miles beyond “ hearsay ”] . Text Messages are almost as good as a Video Tape . Text Messages are the next best thing , to actually being there , in the room , with the Trump planners and plotters and schemers . ...
